block.p: The Image: Unflappable In selecting Dick Cheney as his running mate, Gov. George W. Bush got someone wise in the ways of Washington.
MAN IN THE NEWS, PAGE A19
The Image: Unflappable In selecting Dick Cheney as his running mate, Gov. George W. Bush got someone wise in the ways of Washington.
MAN IN THE NEWS, PAGE A19
The Record: Conservative In his 10 years representing Wyoming, Dick Cheney had one of the most consistently conservative voting records in Congress.
The Screening: By Bush It was the Texas governor himself who did the final background check on the man who was running his search for a running mate.
The Democrats: 'Relief' Advisers to Vice President Al Gore said they were relieved and even happy at the Republican choice of Dick Cheney.

City Is Fighting Fear As Well as Mosquitoes New York's expanded assault on the West Nile virus prompts concerns about the effects of pesticides on the area's fragile ecosystem and poses personal challenges to a mayor who needs to be in charge.

Support Sought for Missiles Defense Secretary William S. Cohen said the proposed American missile defense system, which would rely on radar stations abroad, cannot succeed without overcoming the opposition of NATO allies.
Attack Suspect Freed A homeless man accused of hitting a woman with a chunk of concrete is ordered released.
